title: Fruity Cashino Fruit Machines
description:
Fruity Cashino lands on the iPhone and iPad in glorious free to play 3D. A collection of real pub and arcade fruit machines including Jackpot Genie, Luck O’ The Irish, Bar-X, 5 Star Roulette, and other familiar names such as Double up the Diamond, iFruitBomb Revolution and VIZ Showtime. With a raft of trophies to be won, you’re gonna love this compilation.

Jackpot Genie
An all new pub fruit machine, packed with features such as Ali Grabba, Aladdin Riches, Golden Wonders, Dream Maker, and plenty more.

Bar-X Classic Deluxe
The most popular fruit machine in the UK for many years, Bar-X has been in constant production since 1981. With over 100,000 machines sold to arcades, clubs and bingo halls, Bar-X now lands on your iPhone and iPad in glorious free to play 3D.

Luck O’ The Irish
The hilarious tongue in cheek, Irish themed fruit machine. Packed with features such as Lotta Luck, On the Fiddle, Clover Cash, The Little Fella, In the Money, Make a Wish, and a whole lot more.

Alice in Bonusland
An all new slots game, based around a well known theme, packed with fun features.

iFruitBomb Revolution
The iFruitBomb games have been available on the iPhone and iPad since 2009. The first in the series was originally launched as a 2D game, being transformed with the introduction of 3D gameplay very early in its evolution. iFruitBomb Revolution is a real machine arcade prototype based around these existing games.

Double up the Diamond
Based on a real pub fruit machine, packed with features such as Reel Roulette, Diamond Scatter, Rise and Fall, Filthy Rich, Diamond Dash, and plenty more.

Kingdom of Wealth
Based on the real machine of the same name, head into battle as the Queen, Monk and Barbarian attempt to take control of the kingdom.

5 Star Roulette
Based on the pub roulette game of the same name, 5 Star Roulette brings the high stakes world of the roulette table to your fingertips. Featuring bonus in-game scratch cards when you grab your winnings.

VIZ Showtime
Roger Mellie, the Man on the Telly presents his gameshow themed fruit machine, VIZ Showtime, on the iPhone and iPad in glorious free to play 3D. Based on the real pub fruit machine of the same name, it packs a punch with a stack of features including Morning Glory, Cash Convoy, Razzle Dazzle, Mellie’s Money, Roger’s Big Deal and plenty more.

Free Gameplay Credit - Run out of credit? You’ll get free virtual scratch cards to play with every hour (Requires an online connection) to try your luck and grab free credit awards.

Highscores - On the Bank Run you have 10 minutes to cash out with as much virtual cash as possible

Please note: All wins are simulated with the award of virtual credits for use within this game compilation. An internet connection is required in order to download the games within this compilation.
